front.title: A Profile for Resource Certificate Repository Structure

abstract.t: This document defines a profile for the structure of repositories that contain X.509 / PKIX Resource Certificates, Certificate Revocation Lists and signed objects. This profile contains the proposed object naming scheme, the contents of repository publication points, the contents of publication point manifests and a possible internal structure of a Repository Cache that is intended to facilitate synchronization across a distributed collection of repositories and facilitate certificate path construction.
